00005 #include "i3DEngine.h"
00006 #include <gl/glut.h>
00007 #include <math.h>
00008 
00009 class SphereModel : public Model {
00010   void renderObject() {
00011     glScalef( 1, 1, fabs( sin( angle().y()*(M_PI/180.0) ) ) + .5 );
00012     glutSolidSphere( .5, 24, 16 );
00013     glDisable( GL_LIGHTING );
00014     glScalef( 1.01, 1.01, 1.01 );
00015     glColor4f( 1, 1, 1, .75 );
00016     glutWireSphere( .5, 24, 16 );
00017     glEnable( GL_LIGHTING );
00018   }
00019 };
